tachyon.worker.block.evictor

Interface Evictor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EvictorBase, GreedyEvictor, LRFUEvictor, LRUEvictor, PartialLRUEvictor

    @PublicApi
public interface Evictor
    Interface for the eviction policy in Tachyon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Evictor.Factory 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EvictionPlan freeSpaceWithView(long availableBytes, BlockStoreLocation location, BlockMetadataManagerView view)
      Frees space in the given block store location and with the given view.

    • Method Detail

      • freeSpaceWithView

        EvictionPlan freeSpaceWithView(long availableBytes,
                             BlockStoreLocation location,
                             BlockMetadataManagerView view)
        Frees space in the given block store location and with the given view. After eviction, at least one StorageDir in the location has the specific amount of free space after eviction. The location can be a specific StorageDir, or BlockStoreLocation.anyTier() or BlockStoreLocation.anyDirInTier(int). The view is generated and passed by the calling tachyon.worker.block.BlockStore.

        This method returns null if Evictor fails to propose a feasible plan to meet the requirement, or an eviction plan with toMove and toEvict fields to indicate how to free space. If both toMove and toEvict of the plan are empty, it indicates that Evictor has no actions to take and the requirement is already met.

        Parameters:
        availableBytes - the amount of free space in bytes to be ensured after eviction
        location - the location in block store
        view - generated and passed by block store
        Returns:
        an eviction plan (possibly with empty fields) to get the free space, or null if no plan is feasible
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if given block location is invalid
